ayas.text: ḥā mīm
wal kitābil mubīn
innā ja`alnāhu qur-ānan `arabiyyal la`allakum ta`qilūn
wa innahu fī ummil kitābi ladaynā la`aliyyun ḥakīm
afanaḍribu `ankumudh dhikra ṣafḥan an kuntum qawman musrifīn
wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fil-awwalīn
wa mā ya-tīhim min nabiyyin illā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn
fa-ahlaknā ashadda minhum baṭshan wa maḍā mathalul-awwalīn
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna khalaqahunnal `azīzul `alīm
alladhī ja`ala lakumul-arḍa mahdan waja`ala lakum fīhā subulal la`allakum tahtadūn
wal ladhī nazzala minas samā-i mā-an biqadarin fa-ansharnā bihi baldatan maytā ۚ kadhālika tukhrajūn
wal ladhī khalaqal-azwāja kullahā waja`ala lakum minal fulki wal-an`āmi mā tarkabūn
litastawu `alā ẓuhūrihi thumma tadhkurū ni`mata rabbikum idhas-tawaytum `alayhi wataqūlū subḥānal ladhī sakhhara lanā hādhā wa mā kunnā lahu muqrinīn
wa innā ilā rabbinā lamunqalibūn
waja`alū lahu min `ibādihi juz-ā ۚ innal-insāna lakafūrun mubīn
amit-takhadha mimmā yakhluqu banātin wa-aṣfākum bil banīn
wa idhā bushhira aḥaduhum bimā ḍaraba lirraḥmāni mathalan ẓalla wajhuhu muswaddan wahuwa kaẓīm
awa man yunashha-u fil ḥilyati wahuwa fil khiṣāmi ghayru mubīn
waja`alul malā-ikatal ladhīna hum `ibādur raḥmāni ināthā ۚ ashahidū khalqahum ۚ satuktabu shahādatuhum wayus-alūn
waqālū law shā-ar raḥmānu mā `abadnāhum ۗ mā lahum bidhālika min `il-m ۖ in hum illā yakhruṣūn
am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mustamsikūn
bal qālū innā wajadnā ābā-anā `alā ummatin wa innā `alā āthārihim muhtadūn
wakadhālika mā arsalnā min qablika fī qaryatim min nadhīrin illā qāla mutrafūhā innā wajadnā ābā-anā `alā ummatin wa innā `alā āthārihim muqtadūn
qāla awalaw ji-tukum bi-ahdā mimmā wajadtum `alayhi ābā-akum ۖ qālū innā bimā ursiltum bihi kāfirūn
fantaqamnā minhum ۖ fanẓur kayfa kāna `āqibatul mukadhhibīn
wa idh qāla ibrāhīmu li-abīhi waqawmihi innanī barā-un mimmā ta`budūn
illal ladhī faṭaranī fa-innahu sayahdīn
waja`alahā kalimatan bāqiyatan fī `aqibihi la`allahum yarji`ūn
bal matta`tu hā-ulā-i wa-ābā-ahum ḥattā jā-ahumul ḥaqqu warasūlun mubīn
walammā jā-ahumul ḥaqqu qālū hādhā siḥrun wa innā bihi kāfirūn
waqālū lawlā nuzzila hādhal qur-ānu `alā rajulin minal qaryatayni `aẓīm

ahum yaqsimūna raḥmata rabbik ۚ naḥnu qasamnā baynahum ma`īshatahum fil ḥayātid dunyā ۚ warafa`nā ba`ḍahum fawqa ba`ḍin darajātin liyattakhidha ba`ḍuhum ba`ḍan sukhriyyā ۗ waraḥmatu rabbika khayrun mimmā yajma`ūn
walawlā an yakūnan nāsu ummatan wāḥidatan laja`alnā liman yakfuru bir raḥmāni libuyūtihim suqufan min fiḍḍatin wa ma`ārija `alayhā yaẓharūn
walibuyūtihim abwāban wasururan `alayhā yattaki-ūn
wazukhrufā ۚ wa in kullu dhālika lammā matā`ul ḥayātid dunyā ۚ wal-ākhiratu `inda rabbika lil-muttaqīn
wa man ya`shu `an dhikrir raḥmāni nuqayyiḍ lahu shayṭānan fahuwa lahu qarīn
wa innahum layaṣuddūnahum `anis sabīli wayaḥsabūna annahum muhtadūn
ḥattā idhā jā-anā qāla yālayta baynī wabaynaka bu`dal mashriqayni fabi-sal qarīn
walan yanfa`akumul yawma idh ẓalamtum annakum fil `adhābi mushtarikūn
afa-anta tusmi`uṣ ṣumma aw tahdil `umya wa man kāna fī ḍalālin mubīn
fa-immā nadh-habanna bika fa-innā minhum muntaqimūn
aw nuriyannakal ladhī wa`adnāhum fa-innā `alayhim muqtadirūn
fastamsik bil ladhī ūḥiya ilayk ۖ innaka `alā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm
wa innahu ladhikrul laka waliqawmik ۖ wasawfa tus-alūn
was-al man arsalnā min qablika min rusulinā aja`alnā min dūnir raḥmāni ālihatan yu`badūn
walaqad arsalnā mūsā bi-āyātinā ilā fir`awna wa mala-ihi faqāla innī rasūlu rabbil `ālamīn
falammā jā-ahum bi-āyātinā idhā hum minhā yaḍ-ḥakūn
wa mā nurīhim min āyatin illā hiya akbaru min ukhtihā ۖ wa-akhadhnāhum bil `adhābi la`allahum yarji`ūn
waqālū yā-ayyuhas sāḥirud-`u lanā rabbaka bimā `ahida `indaka innanā lamuhtadūn
falammā kashafnā `anhumul `adhāba idhā hum yankuthūn
wanādā fir`awnu fī qawmihi qāla yāqawmi alaysa lī mulku miṣra wahādhihil-anhāru tajrī min taḥtī ۖ afalā tubṣirūn
am ana khayrun min hādhal ladhī huwa mahīnun walā yakādu yubīn
falawlā ulqiya `alayhi aswiratun min dhahabin aw jā-a ma`ahul malā-ikatu muqtarinīn
fastakhaffa qawmahu fa-aṭā`ūh ۚ innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīn
falammā āsafūnan-taqamnā minhum fa-aghraqnāhum ajma`īn
faja`alnāhum salafan wa mathalal lil-ākhirīn
walammā ḍuribab-nu maryama mathalan idhā qawmuka minhu yaṣiddūn
waqālū a-ālihatunā khayrun am huw ۚ mā ḍarabūhu laka illā jadalā ۚ bal hum qawmun khaṣimūn
in huwa illā `abdun an`amnā `alayhi waja`alnāhu mathalal libanī isrā-iyl
walaw nashā-u laja`alnā minkum malā-ikatan fil-arḍi yakhlufūn
wa innahu la`il-mul lissā`ati falā tamtarunna bihā wattabi`ūn ۚ hādhā ṣirāṭun mustaqīm
walā yaṣuddannakumush shayṭān ۖ innahu lakum `aduwwun mubīn
walammā jā-a `īsā bil bayyināti qāla qad ji-tukum bil ḥikmati wali-ubayyina lakum ba`ḍal ladhī takhtalifūna fīh ۖ fattaqullāha wa-aṭī`ūn
innallāha huwa rabbī warabbukum fa`budūh ۚ hādhā ṣirāṭun mustaqīm
fakhtalafal-aḥzābu min baynihim ۖ fawaylul lilladhīna ẓalamū min `adhābi yawmin alīm
hal yanẓurūna illas sā`ata an ta-tiyahum baghtatan wahum lā yash`urūn
al-akhillā-u yawma-idhin ba`ḍuhum liba`ḍin `aduwwun illal-muttaqīn
yā`ibādi lā khawfun `alaykumul yawma walā antum taḥzanūn
alladhīna āmanū bi-āyātinā wakānū muslimīn
ud-khulul jannata antum wa-azwājukum tuḥbarūn
yuṭāfu `alayhim biṣiḥāfin min dhahabin wa-akwāb ۖ wafīhā mā tashtahīhil-anfusu wataladhhul-a`yun ۖ wa-antum fīhā khālidūn
watilkal jannatul latī ūrithtumūhā bimā kuntum ta`malūn
lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun minhā ta-kulūn
innal mujrimīna fī `adhābi jahannama khālidūn
lā yufattaru `anhum wahum fīhi mublisūn
wa mā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humuẓ ẓālimīn
wanādaw yāmāliku liyaqḍi `alaynā rabbuk ۖ qāla innakum mākithūn
laqad ji-nākum bil ḥaqqi walākinna aktharakum lilḥaqqi kārihūn
am abramū amran fa-innā mubrimūn
am yaḥsabūna annā lā nasma`u sirrahum wanajwāhum ۚ balā warusulunā ladayhim yaktubūn
qul in kāna lirraḥmāni waladun fa-ana awwalul `ābidīn
subḥāna rabbis samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbil `arshi `ammā yaṣifūn
fadharhum yakhūḍū wayal`abū ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumul ladhī yū`adūn
wahuwal ladhī fis samā-i ilāhun wafil-arḍi ilāh ۚ wahuwal ḥakīmul `alīm
watabārakal ladhī lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumā wa`indahu `il-mus sā`ati wa ilayhi turja`ūn
walā yamlikul ladhīna yad`ūna min dūnihish shafā`ata illā man shahida bil ḥaqqi wahum ya`lamūn
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqahum layaqūlunnallāh ۖ fa-annā yu-fakūn
waqīlihi yārabbi inna hā-ulā-i qawmul lā yu-minūn
faṣfaḥ `anhum waqul salām ۚ fasawfa ya`lamūn
